name: MYTH Online
description:
A land of Adventure and Magic Awaits...

Journey back to a simpler time as you embark on an adventure into the land of Myth. Create your character, slay monsters, collect gear and level your skills in this throwback to classic RPGs of old. 

Features

  • Max level of 40
  • 4 Races to play as
  • Trade Skills
  • Classless System
  • No Instanced Dungeons
  • Full Loot PvP
  • And Many More to Discover...

Join the discord today to become a part of the community: https://discord.gg/4KvHNV3
